This suit literally had EVERYTHING we needed except socks. Lol It even gave the choice of a bow tie or necktie. Great value for the money!!

My 6 year old son is very tall so it is hard finding clothes for him for his size. I decided to buy him a size 10 suit and then fix the waist. That was my best best bet because the length was perfect. My boy looked real dapper in his suit. The shade of grey also complemented his complexion. He wore it with blue necktime and suspenders. It's definitely 5 stars for me.
Perfect size wonderful material

I never do reviews. But just wanted to help another parent looking for suit. The adjustable waist was extremely helpful. I got a size 14. A tiny bit big, but was able to adjust the waist and couldn’t tell the pants were a bit big. It came with the shirt, pants, vest, suit jacket & a bow tie and regular tie. I was able to iron all the pieces with no issues. I would recommend.
This suit is made of quality fabric and fits very well. Delivery was quick.

Ordering clothes online, is a hit & miss, when you're buying for someone else. Although the suit fit, it was pretty snug. I decided against keeping it, because of that. It was a very nice, well made suit. I like that I was able to try it, before I buy it. I would recommend. I would also recommend going up 2 full sizes. I ordered a size 16, but he needed a size 18. He's 12 yrs old and wears a 14 in pants. Fabric was decent. Color was as expected. The vest was too big, while the pants and jacket were very snug.

From reading reviews and buying the suit, I think sizing just depends on your child and what you get sent.  I bought 3 sizes, because then I could return whichever one didn't fit.  My son is 5'8, 118 lbs, and very skinny.  The 20 fit him fine.  Just a little extra room in pants which was perfect and jacket was good.  I don't really like the support in the coat shoulders, but it looks fine.  The length is perfect for jacket- not much room for growth, but it's an inexpensive suit he'll probably only wear once or twice this year.  The pants definitely are slim fit on bottom part.  Luckily, he is very skinny.  Ironically, the 18 pants were huge and the jacket fit the same.  So weird the 18 pants are so big, but the 20 pants fit well.  This suit is definitely hit or miss depending on your child's size and the suit size.  I would ordered a few different sizes since it's free returns.

评论概述: Soft and comfy but button fell of on second wear
评论详情: I liked that the size I ordered was true-to-fit, soft and comfortable, lightweight for warm weather. I machine washed on gentle even though it was recommended to dry clean and the food stains came out with oxy booster and no shrinking or damage (air dried). I know that kids are rough on clothes and I machine washed but a button fell off the second time he wore it. I recommend this suit anyway and good value, especially because it will probably only be worn a few times!

It’s a great-looking suit, but My son wore it to his Kindergarten graduation. The buttons were sewn on so loosely. We didn't even risk trying to button the jacket for fear of falling off. But the suit was excellent for what it a nice suit. He got many compliments on it.
Quality

When I say I absolutely LOVED this 3 piece set hands down I would order again. I ordered my sons a size 6 and 16 & it’s definitely true to size. The quality was great a few kinks but nothing that’s not fixable. For the price it was worth it!

I meant to put this review a while ago but I has been so busy. This suit wad order for a wedding. Package came broken as if the bag wad old, and the jackets button came already broken. Updated !!! I order a new color suit for this year for my son. Order 14 and pants fit perfectly everything is really small, so I order a size 16 and the pants are huge and long but the vest and coat are still too small. So I order a 18 and everything is huge!! Talking about is the length for my 6’ son. Also only size 18 came with tags, none of the other suits had a tag and to return they are asking if I kept the tag on? What tag. Also the pants and coats have loose threads. Worst quality than the year before. I’m done with this brand.  I have a 17 y/o 5’5 123lbs this suit is navy. The coat fit a bit too boxy for my slim child. Pants are very long they would need to be adjusted. Quality seems ok! Better than the other one we got. The with strip at coat pocket is a hit or miss great if you are pairing with white shirt and maybe some tennis shoes but with darker colors etc it would stand out too much. Is a good set overall

It seems to be a good quality. The fit is a little off compared to his other clothes that are the same size. The shoulders have a slight padding so they stick out to the sides. The pants are a little long but I will just hem them up. Better too long than too short.  It didn't come with the vest! The vest was the whole reason my 14 y/o son chose this suit over the Calvin Klein suit I wanted to get him.  What we received was just the jacket and pants. This was a last minute buy as the formal dance is this week so we don't want to risk sending it back and getting another set. Oh well. Next time we will go with a different brand simply because we didn't get all of what we purchased .
The suit was no where close to the size chart listed. I ordered the 14y and it would have fit a 5 year old. Avoid this buy

评论概述: loose seam threads and half sewn shut pants pocket
评论详情: It fit him well and looked good on him, but some of the threads were loose in the pant leg, and when I gently tugged on it the thread began to pucker, so it wasn't properly tied off, and one of the front pants pockets was half sewn shut. I feel that part of the suit was rushed. I would have returned for an exchange but he needed the suit for a dance and there wasn't enough time for that, so I fixed the pants myself. If I hadn't he would have ended up with the seam parting down the inseam.
